All just pretty simple development so far.
moves.7... O-O 8. O-O b6 9. Be3 a6 10. h3 Bb7: Obviously going quickly for a lot of pressure.
moves.12... Ne5 13. Bxg7 Nxf3+: Trying to relieve pressure by taking one of his attackers.
I saw it coming, then forgot :-(. Very nice fork
moves.19... Kg8 20. Nxd8 Raxd8 21. Qe3 fxg4 22: If he'd have taken my pawn on h3, things would have been much different.
Not sure what this was for, but it gave me a chance.
moves.32... Be4+ 33. Kg3 Rf7f3+ 34. Kh4 Rf3f4+: If he'd have taken my rook, the game would've been his. Too attached to his queen.
moves.35. Kxh3 Bf5+ 36. Kg3 Rf4f3+ 37. Kh4 Rh3: In his haste to attack, I think he overlooked my mate opportunity against the side of the board. How I managed to win is still a mystery. I'm surprised.
